xdi2.transport.impl.websocket.interceptor

Interface WebSocketTransportInterceptor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Extension<Transport<?,?>>, Interceptor<Transport<?,?>>

    public interface WebSocketTransportInterceptor
extends Interceptor<Transport<?,?>>
    Interceptor that is executed when it receives an incoming message.
